auth.title: Welcome Back
auth.subtitle: Continue with your Google account
auth.description: Sign in to access your dashboard
auth.loginRequired: Please login to access this page
auth.agreeToTerms: By continuing, you agree to our

home.title: CineQo
home.subtitle: Professional Micro-Drama Creation Tool
home.slogan: Make creation easier, make stories better
home.description: From script to final cut, an all-in-one micro-drama creation platform. AI-assisted creation to help content creators efficiently produce high-quality micro-drama works.

hero.title: Professional Micro-Drama
hero.subtitle: From script to final cut, an all-in-one micro-drama creation platform

features.title: Powerful Creation Features
features.subtitle: Complete micro-drama creation toolchain to empower your creative journey

script.title: AI Script Writing
script.description: Intelligent script generation and editing with episode management. AI-assisted dialogue creation for more vivid stories.

storyboard.title: Storyboard Design
storyboard.description: Visual storyboard editor for precise shot control. Support for professional settings like shot types and camera movements.

character.title: Character Management
character.description: Unified character management with attributes, relationships, and arcs. Ensure consistency in character portrayal.

scene.title: Scene Management
scene.description: Scene library management and reuse with descriptions and prop lists. Make every scene unique.

ai.title: AI Video Production
ai.description: AI-powered automated video production workflow. Generate videos from text with one click. Dramatically improve creation efficiency.

edit.title: Smart Editing
edit.description: Intelligent video editing tools with quick color grading, transitions, and effects. Give your work a professional touch.

step1.title: Script Writing
step1.description: Create amazing scripts with AI assistance

step2.title: Characters & Scenes
step2.description: Design character images and scene atmosphere

step3.title: Storyboard Design
step3.description: Plan every shot and camera movement

cta.title: Start Creating Your Micro-Drama
cta.description: Join CineQo and experience professional creation tools that bring your stories to life

noEpisodes.title: No Episodes Yet
noEpisodes.description: Please create episodes in the scripts page first, then add storyboards

incompleteEpisode.title: Episode Information Incomplete
incompleteEpisode.description: It is recommended to complete the episode information (summary, hook, script) for better creative ideas.

noShots.title: No Shots Yet
noShots.description: Click the button below to add the first shot for "{title}"

empty.title: No Assets Yet
empty.description: Upload image assets to build your asset library

upload.title: Upload Asset
upload.dragHint: Click or drag file here to upload
upload.fileInfo: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, max 10MB
upload.name: Asset Name

derive.title: Derive New Asset

img2img.label: Image to Image
img2img.description: Generate variations based on original image

inpaint.label: Inpaint
inpaint.description: Modify specific regions of the image

derive.name: Derived Asset Name
derive.promptHint: Modify the source asset's prompt, or enter a new one
derive.strengthHint: Lower values preserve more original features, higher values create more variation
derive.hint: The derivation feature will use AI generation services to create new asset variants. The generation process may take some time, please check progress in Task Center.
derive.inDevelopment: Derivation feature in development, stay tuned

delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete asset "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.warning: Warning: This asset has been used {count} times, deletion will invalidate related references.

generation.title: AI Asset Generation
generation.subtitle: Generate images from text descriptions using AI

form.prompt: Describe what you want to create
form.promptPlaceholderDefault:
Describe in detail what you want to create, for example:

A 30-year-old Asian woman, short hair, modern professional attire, confident smile, studio lighting, high-quality photography, cinematic texture, professional portrait style...
form.promptPlaceholderWithReference:
Create based on reference images, for example:

Adjust to warm sunset tones, keep character pose and expression unchanged, add soft backlight, enhance atmospheric mood...
form.promptHint: Detailed descriptions help AI generate more accurate images. Include: subject, style, lighting, composition, etc.
form.referenceAssetsHint: Select reference images from the asset library on the left, AI will create based on these images
form.noReferenceHint: Select from asset library on the left, or start creating directly

results.title: Generation Successful
results.savedToLibrary: Images have been automatically saved to the asset library and can be viewed in the asset panel on the left

success.generated: Successfully generated {count} image(s) and saved to asset library
